Title: Voice of NCCU 88.7 FM
Description: VNCCU is the first radio station operated totally by students in Taiwan. In 1963, with the passion in broadcasting, a group of students majoring in Journalism founded this station and carried out their dreams. Moreover, members of the station tried hard to transfer the channel to FM88.7 in summer of 1998.
